help-file.title: BARKSKIN
help-file.content:
Area of effect: <victim> Aggressive: No Cumulative: No Duration: Dependent on proficiency of caster Type of spell: Protection
This spell causes the victim's skin to toughen and harden to the consistency of bark, granting a significant armor class improvement and slight protection from melee damage. This also means there is a somewhat higher increase in damage from fire.
